moncenterlib.softdocker module

class moncenterlib.softdocker.SoftDocker

Bases: object

This class is designed to interact with various Linux programs using Docker technology. Thanks to this implementation, it becomes possible to work with programs that were written under Linux the system, both in Windows OS and Linux OS. The following programs are currently present in the Docker image: RTKLib, CATS.

cats()
convbin(in_out_dir: str, config: dict) → dict

_summary_

Returns

_description_

rnx2rtkp(input_dir: str, output_dir: str, config: dict, roles: dict, timeint: int = 0)

_summary_

Returns

_description_

run_container(paths_str2str: list = [], paths_convbin: list = [], paths_rnx2rtkp: list = [], paths_cats: list = [], restart_cont: bool = True) → None

This method is responsible for starting the docker container. Don’t forget to download the original docker image. As input to this method, you must pass the path to the folder where the files for processing will be stored. Also specify the path to the folder where the resulting files will be placed. Such paths must be specified for each program with which you are going to work. The first time you run the method, the container will automatically start and will not shut down until you manually turn it off. If you later want to add or remove paths to programs, you will need to restart the container. For this, a special argument restart_cont is implemented in the methods.

Parameters

  • paths_str2str – The list must contain 2 elements. The first element is the path to the folder where the source files should be. The second element contains the path to the folder where the output files will be saved. Paths for the program STR2STR. Defaults to [].

  • paths_convbin – The list must contain 2 elements. The first element is the path to the folder where the source files should be. The second element contains the path to the folder where the output files will be saved. Paths for the program CONVBIN. Defaults to [].

  • paths_rnx2rtkp – The list must contain 2 elements. The first element is the path to the folder where the source files should be. The second element contains the path to the folder where the output files will be saved. Paths for the program RNX2RTKP. Defaults to [].

  • paths_cats – The list must contain 2 elements. The first element is the path to the folder where the source files should be. The second element contains the path to the folder where the output files will be saved. Paths for the program CATS. Defaults to [].

  • restart_cont – This flag is responsible for restarting the docker container. By default, docker will restart. A reboot is necessary if you have added or removed paths to various programs. Defaults to True.

Raises: pass

Examples

>>> from MonCenterLib.moncenterlib.softdocker import SoftDocker as SD
>>> sd = SD()
>>> paths_convbin = ['/home/test/raw', '/home/test/output_rnx']
>>> paths_rnx2rtkp = ['/home/test/input_rnx', '/home/test/output_pos']
>>> sd.run_container(paths_convbin=paths_convbin,
                     paths_rnx2rtkp=paths_rnx2rtkp,
                     restart_cont=False)
